## hpr1327 :: Frank Bell Bakes Bread

 
Frank Bell prattles on about baking bread while he bakes two loaves of honey wheat bread.

Links:

Table of US, Imperial, and Metric equivalents:  https://whatscookingamerica.net/Q-A/equiv.htm

Picture of honey wheat bread under construction;  https://www.pineviewfarm.net/weblog/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/Frank_Bread.jpg

Frank's generic bread recipe:  https://www.pineviewfarm.net/weblog/2011/11/well-bread/

Sour dough starter:  https://breadbaking.about.com/od/sourdoughbreads/r/basicstarter.htm

Kon-Tiki:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kon-Tiki
